statements.name: PROC R
statements.description: Runs R statements within a SAS session.

arguments.name: INFILE=
arguments.description: identifies a source file or fileref that contains R statements to run within a SAS session.

arguments.name: RESTART
arguments.description: resets the state of R code submissions for a SAS session.

arguments.name: TERMINATE
arguments.description: stops maintaining the R code state in memory and terminates the R state when the R procedure completes. Subsequent calls to the R procedure begin a new instance of the R code state.

statements.name: SUBMIT
statements.description: Identifies the beginning of a block of R code. Enter R statements between the SUBMIT and ENDSUBMIT statements.

statements.name: ENDSUBMIT
statements.description: Specified on a line by itself, this statement identifies the end of a block of R statements.

statements.name: INTERACTIVE
statements.description: Identifies the beginning of R code that you submit interactively.

statements.name: ENDINTERACTIVE
statements.description: Specified on a line by itself, this statement identifies the end of R code that you submit interactively.
